description:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode and Great Drum Toy War.

- Song: Uso
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6
- Song: Detective Conan, Main Theme
Easy ★3, Normal ★1, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6
- Song: Netsujo no Spectrume
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★5, Extreme ★8
- Song: Genesis of AQUARION
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★5, Extreme ★7

*This product is not compatible with Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun!
*Please be aware that the DLC of Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun! cannot be used with Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival
*The songs included in this product may be available in the Taiko Music Pass. Please take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Anime Pack Vol. 3
